page.title: 04CLIFTON,SOCIAL CENTRE,HULL
page.content: The old building that houses Clifton Primary School acts as a focus for the community. During the daytime the Victorian building (built in 1889)is used for both{Nursery}and{Primary {education.}On Wednesday afternoons there is a{Social and Craft Club}for pupils' parents.On Thursday afternoons there is a{Keep Fit Club}in the school hall for local residents. During the early evenings the school is used by the{Playcentre.}Later in the evenings it is used on Mondays by the{Senior {Citizens Social Club,}and on Wednesday by the{Hull Male Voice Choir.}On Thursday evenings the{Cubs,}and Friday the{Scouts}meet in the main hall. On Sunday mornings its a venue for the {West Hull Light Orchestra.}During holiday periods the{Playcentre}expands its hours to maintain the school as a focus during the daytime.
